definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Da 1:7, [[בֵּלְטְאשַׁצַָּר]] Da 10:1 (prob. = Bab. balâṭsu-uṣur, protect his life! COT Da 1:7 Dl in BD:Dn. p. ix; Hoffm:ZA 1887, 56 conj. [[אחר]] [[[ר]]][[בלט שׁ]] Balaṭ ( = good Saturn?) protect the king!—Da 4:5 conn. with Bel, but name then inexplicable), name given to Daniel by Neb.
